channel.title: Invisible NPC's
channel.description: For some reason alot of the NPCs arent showing up on my 317 server. You can see the yellow dots on the mini-map and they move around too.. But they arent showing up on the ground. some of them even attack you, But you cant see them. Where would I go about fixing this at? Corpoal beast is one of them for example.. All help is very much appreciated!

item.title: Invisible NPC's
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You’re missing the models for these npcs.
Solution: Find the appropriate models.

Read full topic
